original_text: And the Lord smote the king, so that he was a leper unto the day of his death, and dwelt in a several house. And Jotham the king's son was over the house, judging the people of the land.
korean_text: 여호와께서 왕을 치셨으므로 그가 죽는 날까지 나병환자가 되어 별궁에 거하고 왕자 요담이 왕궁을 다스리며 그 땅의 백성을 치리하였더라

sentences.original_text: And the Lord smote the king
so that he was a leper
unto the day of his death
and dwelt in a several house
And Jotham the king's son was over the house
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 왕의 아들 요담이 집을 다스렸다

sentences.original_text: judging the people of the land
